QuestData.Title: Bramblethorn
QuestData.Description:
I was playing with Lord and Lady Sharptooth when Papa made me come with him. I dropped poor Lord Sharptooth and one of those big mean monsters grabbed him!
Papa said he'd try to get him back but he's been gone a long time. I think he got busy. Mama and all the adults are busy doing stuff for Mayor Royston.
Lady Sharptooth and I are really sad. Can you beat up that mean monster and save my dino?
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay Bramblethorn and retrieve Lord Sharptooth.
QuestData.CompletionText: Did you find Lord Sharptooth? I think one of the really big monsters has him.
QuestData.RewardText: Yay! Oh. Y-you saw someone? My papa?$B$B<Lynn hugs her toy and sniffs>$b$bI haven't seen my Mama in awhile. I hope she's okay.
